channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Time, Space, and Astral Projection: Exploring the Frontiers of Reality
item.description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through the nature of time and space, exploring the intriguing idea that our perception of time stems from our motion through the cosmos. We delve into the fascinating concept of astral projection and its potential implications for accessing the past, while examining the scientific foundations of relativity and the enigmatic notion of closed timelike curves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
